About.paragraph:
Everything we buy has a carbon footprint. At Know44, we understand the carbon footprint of everything in your retail operation. We allow you to empower your customers to live a carbon-negative lifestyle by purchasing carbon offsets for everything they buy.
Our system integrates seamlessly with retail Entreprise Resource Planning Systems, at no cost to our retail partners. Together, we can make climate action accessible and affordable for consumers, and profitable for businesses.
